titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of September 2018 as "National Alcohol and Drug Addiction Recovery Month".
A resolution supporting the designation of September 2018 as "National Alcohol and Drug Addiction Recovery Month".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the importance of education and prevention of substance use disorder.
Expresses support for exploring how integrated care, community, and sense of purpose can lead to effective and sustainable treatment.
